jd: Hello,Hope you are doing well! Please check out the given JD below, and let me know if you have any candidate for this role. Job Title: Technical Project ManagerLocation: Lexington, Boston, MA (Hybrid - 3 Days Onsite)Duration: 12+ Months Important Notes:MedTech Experience: Candidates must have recent project experience (3-5+ years) working with and supporting MedTech clients.Need only local candidates. Job Description: We are seeking a highly skilled Technical Project Manager with hands-on experience working with MedTech clients. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, experience managing MedTech and Healthcare projects, and deep expertise in Java development and Azure technologies. Technical Skills:Strong Java development expertiseProficiency with Azure and SQLExperience with Restful web services.Capable of handling Full-stack Java development teams Key Responsibilities: Lead and manage projects for MedTech clients, ensuring successful delivery of solutions.Oversee Java Backend Services projects built on a Microservices architecture.Manage full-stack Java development teams, providing technical guidance as needed.Handle system integrations involving both devices and web applications.Work with SQL and NoSQL databases and leverage MS Azure for cloud-based solutions.Utilize Kubernetes orchestration and Terraform (preferred) for infrastructure management.Ensure compliance with MedTech regulations and standards, including HIPAA, FDA, and EUMDR.Apply your knowledge of FHIR and other healthcare-related protocols.Implement Agile methodologies and serve as Scrum Master for project teams.Collaborate effectively with multiple stakeholders, including business, technical, and client teams. Required Qualifications: Recent experience (3-5+ years) working with MedTech clients is mandatory.Strong proficiency in Java development, with experience in RESTful web services.Expertise in MS Azure and SQL.Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and Terraform (preferred).Deep understanding of MedTech regulations, including HIPAA, FDA, and EUMDR.5+ years of experience in Project Management.Experience in managing and delivering MedTech and Healthcare projects.Excellent communication and leadership skills, with strong team-handling experience.Proven experience working with Agile and Scrum methodologies, with past experience as a Scrum Master.
